arts.ttl: ‘I received racist insults’ - Balde reveals abuse at Getafe
arts.sum: Barcelona defender Alejandro Balde says he was subjected to racial abuse during Saturday’s clash with Getafe . The left-back spoke out after the match and says he told the match referee during the 1-1 draw at the Estadio Coliseum.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star confirms he was racially abused during Getafe draw
arts.sum: Barcelona star Alejandro Balde has on Saturday evening confirmed his plans to file a complaint, after being subjected to racial abuse during the club’s meeting with Getafe. Barca, of course,…

arts.ttl: Getafe 1-1 Barcelona: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Catalan giants continue to struggle in La Liga
arts.sum: Barcelona's La Liga struggles continue, with the Catalan outfit being held to a 1-1 draw by Getafe at Estadio Coliseum on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: La Liga side confirm plan to sign Barcelona star in January window
arts.sum: Girona director Quique Carcel dropped a major hint over his plan to sign Eric Garcia this month. The Catalan side have been linked with a renewed move for Garcia despite rising transfer in him interest from Serie A. arts.sum: Barcelona’s supporters have on Saturday once more moved to make clear their frustrations with a leading member of Hansi Flick’s squad. The player in question? Robert Lewandowski. Barcelona of course…
